(Put in "Mission Reports" because I consider it an ongoing 'mission' of sorts, not sure if this is where it quite belongs, mods move it if necessary, or delete this if deemed not appropriate)

A bit of an ongoing 'distraction' of sorts from building WWII plane replicas and launching rockets of mine. This is kind of an interactive story of sorts, you guys decide what tactical decisions I should make.

Background: Two "teams" fighting over the space center, one side has control of the space center. Kind of has a WWII vibe, but most tanks have an M1 Abrams turret because, well, there aren't any other options at the moment. 

Team A initially invaded Administration, but were forced to withdraw.

Standard Team B tank:And Armored Kerbal Carrier

Team A tank:

and a little thing I called the "StuK"

Current situation:

Team B has formed a "bulge" of sorts. (some positions along the front outlined in red not directly involved are not shown just so I can actually play the game) Team A is somewhat short on tanks near the R&D center, but still has some at the front near the runway.

From a Team A perspective, should Team A 1.Counterattack somewhere else 2.Attempt to repulse the attack directly 3. Attempt to encircle Team A, or 4.Retreat and stage a Dunkirk-style evacuation?
Looks like fun.  I suppose the victor will control only ruins, though?
Deploy megashield! Part heat shield, part structural panel. 100% megashield.
